This vignette shows how to process the DWR Suisun Marsh Branch 
field visit and laboratory calibration data sheets. These sheets
used to compute fouling error and sensor drift using the
Wagner Method.

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(wqptools)
library(purrr)
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
# test workbook
workbook = system.file("Sample_Visit_Sheet.xlsx",
  package = "wqptools")


workbook = "C:/Users/mkoohafk/Desktop/FIELD SHEETS/HUN_visit_sheets.xlsx"
sheets = setdiff(excel_sheets(workbook), "TEMPLATE")

visit.data = read_visit(workbook, sheets[1])
fouling.data = list()
visit.data = read_visit(workbook, sheet)
# compute fouling
fouling.data = fouling_error(visit.data)
```
